add_wallet.lbPlease: Please select the wallet you wish to active
add_wallet.lbWe: We require you to active at least one wallet. Please note that additional wallets can be activated later time.

create_wallet.lbExpressDetail: Select this option if you’d like to access your new SOLO Wallet quickly. Please note that you’ll always be able to customize at a later time.
create_wallet.lbCustomDetail: Select this option if you’d like to customize your wallet. You’ll be able to select your wallet Tokens and Currencies, set up a security PIN, and back up your wallet.

import_wallet.lbType: Type in your wallet’s Backup Phrase in the correct sequence below to pair.

backup_wallet_menu.lbViewDetail:
Your Backup Phrase will be displayed as both a QR code and a string of random words.{'

'} Make sure you view your Backup Phrase in private. Anyone with the following QR code and Backup Phrase can gain full access to your funds so DO NOT store them publicly or share with anyone.

paper_wallet_detail.lbEnter: Enter your Private Key or Scan QR code to transfer Paper Wallet faster.

paper_wallet_result.lbLorem: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

backup_phrase_display.lbPleaseWrite: Please write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place as you would with paper money
backup_phrase_display.lbIfYouLose: If you lose your recovery phase, your wallet cannot be recovered.
backup_phrase_display.btnStored: I have safely stored recovery phrase

backup_phrase_confirm.lbPleaseTap: Please tap each word in the correct order.

view_backup_phrase.lbWarningDetail:
Your Backup Phrase will be displayed as both a QR code and a string of random words.{'

'} Make sure you view your Backup Phrase in private. Anyone with the following QR code and Backup Phrase can gain full access to your funds so DO NOT store them publicly or share with anyone.
view_backup_phrase.lbScan: Scan this QR Code with the camera of the device you wish to pair to, or enter the Backup Phrase below.

system.title: System error
system.detail: Your action can not be performed now.

no_wallet.title: Offline - Wallet info not found
no_wallet.detail: User are in offline mode, there is no wallet info at this time.

cancel_request.title: User cancel request.
cancel_request.detail: User click cancel button or back button.

timeout_confirm.title: Timeout confirmation
timeout_confirm.detail: User wait too long for confirmation.

invalid_address.title: Invalid address
invalid_address.detail: Address(es) is not created by Signer.

cannot_view_backup_phrase.detail: Cannot view Backup Phrase now, try later.

cannot_backup_wallet.detail: Cannot backup Wallet now, try later.

weak_password.title: Weak password
weak_password.detail: Please choose a stronger password. Try a mix of letters, numbers, symbols and at least 8 characters.

incorrect_answer.title: Incorrect answer
incorrect_answer.detail:
It's important that you write your backup phrase down correctly. If something happens to your wallet, you'll need this backup_wallet to recover your money.
Please review your backup_wallet and try again.
